member.name: M:CypherQueryBuilder.QueryBase.AssignmentExp
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(?<K>\\w+)\\s*\\=\\s*(?<V>\\w+(\\.\\w+)?)
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase
Explanation:
○ "K" capture group.
○ Match a word character atomically at least once.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ Match '='.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ "V" capture group.
○ Match a word character greedily at least once.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a word character atomically at least once.
